Karen O made a surprise appearance at the New York City vinyl debut listening party of her new album, Crush Songs, playing several songs from the record with guitarist Moses Sumney. O performed for an intimate crowd at the party hosted by Sofar Sounds in a Tribeca loft. 

“Shouting out to all the ladies and mens who listened in living rooms tonight! Thx,” O says of the events. Crush Songs is out September 9 on Cult Records. O is set to play several exclusive shows this fall and has just added a date in San Francisco at Great American Music Hall on September 22 to previously announced dates in New York, Los Angeles and London—which sold out within minutes of going on sale—and Berlin. These special nights include shows at the Hollywood Forever Cemetery’s Masonic Lodge, London’s Bush Hall, Berlin’s Heimathafen, the Manderley Bar at the McKittrick Hotel and a show in the round at Le PoissonRouge.
